patterns: What kinds of items are there?
What kind of products can I obtain?
What kind of products can I find?
What items are listed on FreeSell?
What types of products are available?
responses: We offer products from other users ranging from electronics to apparel and entertainment, all for free!
We do not sell products, instead FreeSell is a community run platform where users buy and sell. We are just the middleman!
You can find items like furniture, electronics, home goods, and more, they are all free!
FreeSell is a community-run marketplace where you can find everything from tech gadgets to clothes, and it is all free!
We have a variety of categories, including tech, fashion, and home appliances.
Yes! All products here are free! However, do be mindful of paying for delivery if you choose that option.

patterns: How do I pay for delivery?
What payment methods do you accept?
Can I use my debit card?
Can I pay with a gift card?
Is there a fee for using meet ups?
responses: You can pay via VISA or Mastercard
We accept VISA and Mastercard for delivery
We accept most major credit cards but do not accept PayPal
You can pay via Visa, Mastercard, but not PayPal.
We accept payments through debit and credit cards, but not PayPal.
Currently, we only accept SGD payments.
No, there are no additional fees for meet ups.

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
How soon can I expect my shipment?
How long do you take to ship items?
What’s the delivery time for my order?
When can I get my product?
How fast is the shipping process?
responses: Delivery takes 2-4 days
Shipping takes 2-4 days
We usually deliver within 2-4 days.
Your shipment will typically arrive in 2-4 business days.
Expect delivery in about 2 to 4 days after your order is confirmed.
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
Why did the chicken cross the road? To get to the other side!
I know, I got my humour from my programmers!

patterns: What does liking a listing do?
responses: Users can use it to track products that they like

patterns: Who can I contact in case of an emergency?
Can I talk to a human?
How do I rate your system?
Can I get help with an issue?
I need help, how can I reach someone?
Can I talk to a representative?
Who do I reach out to if I have a problem?
How can I reach customer support?
responses: You can rate our service under the user profile and click submit feedbacks! We will also respond to them as fast as possible!
For support, you can reach us through the Submit Feedback section on your profile.
If you need assistance, contact our support team by submitting a feedback! We will respond as soon as possible.
You can also submit a feedback under the user profile and we will get back as soon as possible.
Feel free to message through me, FreeSell's chatbot or contact our representatives by submitting a feedback!
FreeSell is a community run marketplace that promotes free-cycling! Users can give away items they no longer want to someone who does, promoting sustainability!
Everything will be fine!
It's alright
There, there, it will be fine.

patterns: How do I create an account?
What do I need to register?
How do I delete my account?
Can I change my email address?
responses: To create an account, click on the ‘Login’ button and fill up username, email and password!
You can update your profile anytime by going to your settings page.
To delete your account, please contact support, and we'll assist you with the process.
You can change your email under account settings.

patterns: Can you help me with anything else?
Tell me a fun fact about recycling!
How can I contribute to sustainability?
responses: Did you know that recycling one aluminum can saves enough energy to power a TV for three hours?
Fun fact: Over 2.5 billion plastic straws are used in the U.S. every day!
Recycling helps reduce pollution, save energy, and conserve natural resources. It’s a win-win!
Did you know that by giving away items you no longer need, you help reduce waste and contribute to sustainability?
That's awesome! I am so happy to hear that!
Great to hear!
I am sorry you’re feeling frustrated. How can I assist?
It sounds like you could use something fun!
Take it easy, everything will be alright. Can I help with anything?
Awesome! Lets make today even better. How can I assist?

responses: You can message other users after logging in and clicking on the message icon
